website_summaries.verdict: Warm and not too heavy, but it may be pricier than some of equal value.
pros: fill weight, 75% down, 25% small down feathers

customer_reviews.title: Good after you air it out
customer_reviews.text: I almost returned this product. I live in arizona so when I first received it the package was hot and the comforter didn't feel good, the texture was so weird right out of the box. I almost placed it back to return but I decided let me try it out for a week. Boy am I glad I did, the heat for some reason made the texture feel ever so slightly bumpy but after I aired it out and 'fluffed' it up, it feels fantastic! I would recommend trying it out for at least a week in case you think at first its bad.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect down comforter for a long time and the ones I have been eyeing at bed bath and beyond were so expensive. Thought I would give this one a try after researching for months. This one is perfect it’s fluffy, warm but not too hot or heavy. It’s light weight and I love how crisp it is. I of course use a duvet cover too to preserve it and for looks. I love how the feathers don’t shed or shift. Worth every penny. I hope it holds up as it has for a long time. Great purchase and more affordable than $500 from bed bath and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Park

customer_reviews.title: great blanket but...
customer_reviews.text: we have had this blanket for 2 years now. it is an awesome blanket overall. It keeps you VERY warm! Its very comfortable. the only down side is all the loose feathers. It drives my wife insane.. we have dark hard wood floors and the feathers are everywhere all the time. you literally have to vacuum them up everyday. cleaning instructions have been followed. So over all for the price its a good blanket but the feathers leaking not so much! I would not buy again just due to the fact the feathers constantly leak. currently looking for this blankets replacement, my reason for the the review.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but feathers are now coming out like confetti
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this comforter in March of 2017. The feathers have gone wild and they are coming out every time I wash my duvet cover. It's all over the place. Very nice at first but now it's just annoying. Would return if I could and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value - incredibly warm (I think that's a good thing)
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described and both looks and feels great. I shouldn't complain about the warmth of a comforter but this is definitely a winter product. Had it on for a few days in the early Fall when it was still decent outside and I was way too hot throughout the night. This could end up becoming a winter comforter.
customer_reviews.author: BrianInChicago

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Other reviews seem accurate based on my opinion ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Other reviews seem accurate based on my opinion of the comforter so far. I am someone who runs cold and I live in Los Angeles, a very temperate climate. Having said that, it's fine now in the spring, but I suspect I will need a little more warmth come winter. But I'm happy to get a quilt for my side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I can say about a down comforter is you can't smell it. The next would be quality. Comfort would be next, but I've never experienced an uncomfortable down comforter. This one is perfect for Northern California, that it is warm but not so thick as to be too warm. Might be a little thin for sub-zero, but it sufficient down to the 30's. The cover has a soft, smooth surface, like sateen and has good baffling to keep the down from drifting, which is also important, like brakes on a car. It also has discreet corner loops for duvet covers and is priced, in my opinion below its value.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: ... onto this naked and disappear entirely into the cloud like folds of this beautiful comforter
customer_reviews.text: So being an albino my first goal was to fall onto this naked and disappear entirely into the cloud like folds of this beautiful comforter. That being said, it was a complete success. But really, after a 20 minute touchup cycle in the dryer, this puffed up substantially. been sleeping with this for a few days now, medium weight id say. Take in mind this is Arizona in fall, and I'm perfectly comfortable. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I love this Royal Down comforter. It replaced a 10 year old Scandia down one that was wonderful. This Royal Hotel comforter exceeds my expectations. It is light weight, comfortably warm and looks fabulous on my bed. I have always put my down comforters in a duvet because I think it protects the comforter and keeps it clean. It also avoids any possible problems with small pin holes made by sitting on it or having animals jump on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I cannot tell you how nice this comforter is
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how nice this comforter is. It is light as far as weight, but, provides great warmth. My husband and I are very satisfied with this purchase. He is particular and has paid a great deal more for a French Brand. I wasn't sure if this would pass his quality test. However, he is so happy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful comforter
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this comforter i ordered from them! I was a little nervous at first but once i opened it I was so surprised at the quality of it. It was flat at first, but it quickly began puffing up to size and it fit perfect on my bed. I loved the pillow like pattern on them, it was exactly what I was looking for. I wouldn’t hesitate to order again from them, highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Haitham

customer_reviews.title: Feathers dont stay within the sewn cells
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on January, 2017 and mostly love it. The problem I have is that most of the feathers are all up at the top of the comforter. I originally put it in the drier, and have fluffed it many, many, many times. It seems that the sewn, 12 inch squares are not holding the feathers in the squares. Somehow, they all traveled to one side of the comforter. Cant get them to go back in place....no matter what I try. Any suggestions? Can I return this one and buy another one? HELP!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph  R. Sura

customer_reviews.title: It's very warm and just perfect. I am really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't so sure about this when I first opened it because it isn't as fluffy as the picture displayed but I shaked it a few times to get it fluffy. It's very warm and just perfect. I am really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: allison schneider

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome comforter, took a day or so to fully fluff up but its great now! Definitely need a duvet cover for it.
customer_reviews.author: Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic at first / Not good after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: We bought this conforter 5 years ago and a little over a year ago most of the feathers have drifted to one side. The feathers are sewn in squares, but there are small gaps on the edges of the squares and over the years they do eventually move. Wish it held up longer as we liked it before it got lopsided.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J. Sos

customer_reviews.title: Good quality comforter at a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter! The fabric is really soft. It's more lightweight and thinner than I was expecting, but is surprisingly warm nonetheless. This, plus a flannel sheet, keeps us good and warm in Bay Area summer (which can actually be quite chilly). Not sure it would be enough in truly cold climates; would probably want something thicker, or another warm blanket on top.
customer_reviews.author: Helena TF

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this comforter. It keeps me so warm without overheating me or my husband. I was a little worried when I got it out of the package because it was so flat. But I just shook it out and after a couple days it fluffed right up. My husband usually gets too hot under a blanket at night but this lets air circulate and you don't get overheated. We both feel that this is the best purchase we have ever made for our bedding. It was definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: TJJ

customer_reviews.title: This Down comforter is by far the most wonderful bedspread ever
customer_reviews.text: This Down comforter is by far the most wonderful bedspread ever. I feel like I am being snuggled by clouds. Puffed right up in the dryer and onto the bed. I highly recommend buying this comforter for any bed. The price point is very inexpensive considering I have researched these down comforters and the range into the $1000 and I feel like I got the $1000 down comforter for only $200.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Not royal
customer_reviews.text: All the feathers have seeped through the comforter I paid $200 for it and I cant even use it dry cleaning is only way to clean it extremely expensive and now collecting dust in closet maybe I got a bad one but never again will I purchase this I should get a refund I'm extremely dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Nick Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: A truly excellent comforter
customer_reviews.text: We have a bunch of different comforters from all over. This was the first from amazon And the first from "royal hotel." It was and is a+. It didn't have any down smell, no loose feather, etc. It has beautiful cotton outer, good baffling etc. It is pretty thick and hearty. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Greenwich Dad

customer_reviews.title: It changes color.
customer_reviews.text: At first I had an issue with this comforter because it was so flat. It eventually got fluffy overtime. And I love it, but now the comforter is changing colors to look like stains, even though it's been in a Pottery Barn white duvet since I've received it. I've not washed it, nor taking it to the cleaners. Anyone else having this issue? Other than the color change this is lovely. It's soft, fluffy and will keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Stacy

customer_reviews.title: so far so good, only had it for a week or so
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, only had it for a week or so.. feels warm for late summer weather but hoping it will be ideal come winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina S

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly times!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I bought this comforter. The weather has been hot one night and cold the next and the comforter adapted to both seamlessly and has kept me at a perfect temperature. It's super fluffy, light and looks amazing. Crazy-awesome price. And my dog has been buried in it for 5 days straight of course. A+.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was my impression from the photo that it was MUCH thicker with more stuffing and fluffy. It was not at all. I am going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Sorrells

customer_reviews.title: Was worried it wouldnt be good quality since it was only 200 for a cal-king
customer_reviews.text: Was worried it wouldnt be good quality since it was only 200 for a cal-king. Its perfect ! Love it. Hubby gets too hot lol but the kiddos and i love it. Looks beautiful on our bed super fluffy!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rylaarsdam

customer_reviews.title: California King Down Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lightweight and warm quilt for the money. It is nicely made and the outside stitching is done well. I have owned several down comforters in the past, and I have to say this is the nicest. I ordered a California King, and it's just the right size for my bed. I love it's coziness. I would definitely consider buying this quilt for one of my other beds.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so did my dog
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so did my dog! On my bed less than 24 hours and she chewed a big hole in the corner. Down everywhere. I guess she was jealous. :( I've ordered it again. Made my bed warm and so inviting. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: this is just as good. no leaking feathers
customer_reviews.text: I bought a $400 one 2 years ago. this is just as good. no leaking feathers, this is great, very warm good price, I will buy again, trust me it's warm enough for Michigan.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E Burgher

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but room temp has to be 60F max for comfort. Otherwise it's too hot. Definitely the warmest bed topping I've ever had - much warmer than the 5 blanket combo I used to use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Lovely down quilt!
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift! Like the fact that it is sewn in squares so the down will not drift! Arrived a few days after order!
customer_reviews.author: PatW

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful for warmth without being too much
customer_reviews.text: Fluffy and warm. I wanted a lot of loft on my bed for decorative purposes, and it does quite well. It is wonderful for warmth without being too much...and I keep my heat at night at 68 to 69 degrees. My husband has horrible allergies and terribly allergic to birds, but has had zero issues with this down comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so soft and comfy! It's an all season down and doesn't get too hot. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Montie

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter...Great price
customer_reviews.text: Buy with confidence replaced our older much bulkier comforter, What a difference although this comforter is much thinner (about 1.5 inches) it insulates so well my wife doesn't use the electric blanket anymore. We enjoy good bedding with high TC we were weren't disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Comfy comforter
customer_reviews.text: we have only had it for a few weeks, but i love this thing. We opened the package and popped it in the dryer on fluff and it came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just so fluffy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best...ever!!! Been searching for a replacement for quite some time, finally pulled the trigger, and boy are we thrilled with iur purchase. So...fluffy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Athanasios A.

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent and the fill is great
customer_reviews.text: The down comforter met and exceeded my expectations. The quality is excellent and the fill is great. The Egyptian Cotton is great and the thread count is as expected. The amount of fill and quality of the fill exceeds other competing products. I am very pleased with the product and would recommend it to others looking for a down comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is terrific. Very cozy. Highly recommend it. Fits the bed beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the down filling? No filling at all!!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth $200. I expected alot better for the price and cannot understand how this product got so many rave reviews. The comforter has barely any filling at all. It is literally just two sheets sewn together with minimal filling. It is July now and it barely keeps me warm. Needless to say that this comforter will not get the job done when winter comes. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND comfortable. I have been only able to get about ...
customer_reviews.text: BEYOND comfortable. I have been only able to get about 2 to 4 hours a sleep every night. After getting this comforter I don't want to get out of bed. Thank goodness I work from home.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Petrocco

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving but don't a judge a book by its cover
customer_reviews.text: Great duvet I read the comments about it not being fluffy once out of the packaging, like in other reviews I put it on tumble no heat and pulled it out fluffed by hand some more and the comforter fluffed right up. Bought a duvet cover and still loving the comforter so and can't wait for the winter months
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gamache

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is exceptional in every way, Comfort, Warmth, and Quality! Thank You so Much! Sincerely, Deborah Nitschke
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Nitschke

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter I have bought 2 as the first one I have had over a year is going well so I bought another for the spare bedroom I just renovated...
customer_reviews.author: Hardcore Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable, and will make you feel like you’re sleeping in a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: DRod

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend and re-purchase as a gift for friends and family
customer_reviews.text: As described and expected. I would recommend and re-purchase as a gift for friends and family. Not one to write reviews, but this was justified as it is nice to still find quality people and companies making quality products.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Fluff it in dryer before putting it on your bed.
customer_reviews.text: Feels and looks very luxurious and also very warm. I fluffed it up in my dryer upon receiving the order and the blanket fluffed up very nicely. Have slept under it 5 nights now and it is so very comfortable, light but warm as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Guerra

customer_reviews.title: bed time
customer_reviews.text: Super warm comfy feels and looks great my dog and cat I think love it more than we do..
customer_reviews.author: huey2000ss

customer_reviews.title: Easy returns process
customer_reviews.text: Okay comforter. I was looking for something with more loft. Very warm! Ended up returning for a loftier comforter. Easy returns process.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love this down comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I love this down comforter. It met all my expectations. It's very soft, the fill power is amazing and it's very light yet warm. Great for all seasons!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT IN EVERY WAY! EXCEEDED MY EVERY HOPE AND EXPECTATION!! Outstanding quality and workmanship!!! Purchase without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: stacy harris

customer_reviews.title: Above average comforter.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an extremely fluffy, poofy comforter this is not it. However, for the price this is a very good comforter. It's very comfortable, above average weight and fluff. It's a good all year round warmth. Only complaint is that I would expect it to be more fluffy for the fill power.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Cobbin

customer_reviews.title: Best down comforter we have ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this down comforter! Best comforter we have ever had!!! Pure luxury! Generous sizing. Down has not shifted. Buy it! You will not be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Stockton

customer_reviews.title: down comforter
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the king-sized down comforter. It met my expectations. It was shipped to me promptly and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Granny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's made with beautiful cotton and it is very lofty. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane G. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's well constructed. I like the fact that the feathers don't shift. It's not heavy but very warning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this down comforter. its even better than i expected and fits my California King perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Riley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Soft, warm, makes me not want to get out of bed
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: I love this duvet
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and warm! Stays fluffy all the time! Never sheds! I love this duvet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this comforter for our cabin. It is light, yet very warm! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is huge and comfy!! When it first arrived I was a little worried because it was so smooshed I thought it was going to be much thinner than advertised. I was wrong! I let it air for a few hours on our bed and by the time it was evening it was bigger and bulkier. I have had it now for a few months and it fits our king bed perfectly. I have bought comforters in the past that barely fit over our king mattress but not this one. It is a great size, very warm and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Runnermom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful down comforter
customer_reviews.text: I love this down comforter. It's light and airy and warm. I'm European and have always had a down comforter on my bed. This one reminds me of the one I grew up with.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele O

customer_reviews.title: Me and my wife love this comforter
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife love this comforter .... we have had many over the years and this is far the best and lest expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This down comforter is warm, soft, lofty and darn-near perfect. I highly recommend a duvet cover to protect it. Like the other reviews mentioned, it takes it a couple of hours to "fluff up" and then it's fine. I use this comforter with a sheet and that's all I need. It keeps you warm in the winter and it's light enough (I hope) to use during the summer months, as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Portsmouth

customer_reviews.title: Best Comforter, Truly Luxurious, Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many down comforters for $100+ before finding this one and none of them were nearly as good as this one and this comforter is worth every penny. Most have a lousy fill power or are not comfortable and sleeping with this comforter is truly luxurious. It also has convenient ties in all corners to tie to one of Royal Hotel's duvet covers which I would also recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul I.

customer_reviews.title: Best down comforter in the world!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular about my bedding. I have very high expectations and this was one of the best purchases I have ever made. This item is very well made and very very soft, fluffy, and quiet. It fits my Cal King perfectly. Do not need to look further for a great deal. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bald Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this Comforter is like being in a cloud, I had the best night ever
customer_reviews.author: dale guettler

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have a down comforter/duvet! This is heaven!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new duvet! It is almost too warm in the upper midwest's "frozen tundra" and that is exactly what I was hoping for. This plus a regular cotton or cotton blend sheet is definitely warm enough on those subzero nights when the wind just makes the house colder. The box-stitching is very effective at keeping all the down where it's supposed to be with no shifting. This was a GREAT buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Annie C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Not too warm not too thin! just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I really did like it, but it was too warm
customer_reviews.text: I really did like it, but it was too warm! All my life I have loved to snuggle up in down comforters, but alas...menopause hit. My brother is going to love this.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Feener

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to anyone who wants quality for an economic ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cost effective! My wife loves this blanket! I would recommend it to anyone who wants quality for an economic price.
customer_reviews.author: SilentJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful comforter. I too was concerned when I saw the size but I let it fill out over a week and then put it on the bed. It is very well constructed and it super warm. I would absolutely recommend it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Seastrom

customer_reviews.title: Bought this in King size for Florida and love it. I will definitely purchase another in Queen ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in King size for Florida and love it. I will definitely purchase another in Queen when I redo my room.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I was worried it wouldn't be as ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I was worried it wouldn't be as nice as some more expensive down comforters, but it feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Andi Olivia Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice & warm - love it - should have requested over size for our calf king bed,
customer_reviews.author: William Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for such a good production. I bought another two queen size comforter.
customer_reviews.author: yongjejo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed using it in winter, fall, and sometime in summer too.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter! However, it is VERY warm. No blanket or pajamas needed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: great produce terrific price
customer_reviews.text: this is much better then the ones I saw advertised in the catalogues. it is light, warm and well made,
customer_reviews.author: Edward W. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love the item. I have the same quality sheets. I plan on getting more! I had heard of how good they were and had to find out for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Jack jameson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: It does everything it's expected to do ! Keeps you warm on cold winter nights! Awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Walford B Lindo

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the comforter!! It was better than I Expected! Light weight, but keeps me warm. Good quality so far, hopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Zizzo

customer_reviews.title: This is so soft and comfortable - everything we expected and more
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as described, arrived on a timely basis and we are really enjoying it. I would purchase again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Not as "poofy" as expected, but would buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.text: Nice big comforter. It's not as "poofy" as expected, but it definitely delivers a big punch. This thing gets very warm. I mostly sleep on top of it with the window open, and then get underneath in the middle of the night when I wake up chilly. We're very pleased with what we got. I would absolutely but it again if I were to go back in time. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Mnemonic

customer_reviews.title: but was happy to see it is
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried from some of the reviews that this may not be very warm, but was happy to see it is. This fluffed up pretty quickly and though I was a bit hot in this, my wife found it to be just right. I would defiantly recommend this to product.
customer_reviews.author: David A Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this comforter!
customer_reviews.text: We spent a great deal of time researching down comforter options and prices. We were looking for a great quality item at a good price. We certainly found it in this comforter! We wanted 100% Goose Down, a high count Egyptian cotton cover, the baffle box design and the side-gussets all in fluffy, warm comforter. We have been very happy with this amazing comforter. We were surprised at how quickly it arrived. It was packed in a smaller package but when we took it out and allowed it to fluff up it was perfect! We are toasty warm (but not overly so) and comfy. Each time I get in bed, I sigh with happiness (corny sounding but true)!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Really like our comforter. It started out being a little warm as we put it on our bed when the temps were warmer outside. Now that it's gotten cold and our bedroom is quite cool, it feels great! Love it and so do our dog and cat! I got a duvet cover for it and that has worked out well too.
customer_reviews.author: Lois C.

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised and expected. Light, warm and perfect fit for our duvet snd bed. Highly rated and would recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Mischka

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter great response time as always amazon has done good for me. Will buy again in near future thanks
customer_reviews.author: carl tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Down doesn't shift around to the sides or bottom & it's very warm. We are very happy we chose this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Tim vas Dias

customer_reviews.title: California - King Size Down- Comforter 1500-ThreadCount Siberin Goose Down
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but I do not like the smell of it . Everytime I walk in the room I smell the feathers!
customer_reviews.author: Johnyciw

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this down comforter, just wish it didn't lose so many feathers! Also, it acquired a funny smell after washing. Still great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: D Fortuna

customer_reviews.title: Right size and just baout the right thickness
customer_reviews.text: The size of this comforter is perfect for my King size bed. The last comforter did not cover the bed enough, even though it was "King Size". The comforter is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Boren

customer_reviews.title: Quality is the best. And highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging is encased in a transparent plastic bag attached with zipper. Product is less bulky because it is compressed packing. Laying goose down comforter on the bed and pat a palm for volume expansion. Over time, rises more bloated. Excellent thermal insulation and very light weight. Sweating occurs within the my body because Goose Down Used. Duvet cover is also very smooth. Because occurs when the goose down dust robbed a comforter I recommend duvet covers. If Alaska is non, Goose Down 60Oz is excessive. Because my body sweating and my hot, when use it So I recommend 50Oz. I am a man Korea. And the quality is the best. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: seokjai Hong

customer_reviews.title: Every body is happy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for our bed and ended up buying two more for grand kids. Every body is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Teller

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I are so in love with this comforter
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are so in love with this comforter... There aren't enough words to describe how amazing it is except you feel like you are sleeping on a cloud and are so excited every time you get to lay down in luxury...
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Dill

customer_reviews.title: It's terrible. Gave to my boyfriend as a gift and ...
customer_reviews.text: This comforter has been shedding non-stop. It's terrible. Gave to my boyfriend as a gift and everytime we move the blanket white feathers are everywhere. Very disappointed for so much money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing and comparing several down comforters, this is the product I selected. It is exactly as described and is just the right size. I am very pleased with my purchase. The baffle design keeps the filling evenly distributed and each square contains equal amounts of the down feathers. It fits my standard king perfectly and looks beautiful. Very pleased customer and I am glad I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Love this comforter
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, great quality for the price. I have been looking at down comforters for some time and I can not believe how nice this one is. This comforter is very warm and I can imagine that for some people would be too hot.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen goba

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We have had ours for a little over 2 yrs and it is still fantastic. Very fluffy and warm, no problems with it at all. The only time it ever cones off our ved is to be cleaned, so it has geld up amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: laura snapp

customer_reviews.title: Every Bit as Good As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is worth to spend the extra money when it comes to a comforter. That being said this is far and away the best comforter I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: mark Claiborne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent warmth, lighter in weight than expected which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent warmth, lighter in weight than expected which is a plus. Delivery was on time. Quality of construction seems to be excellent. I would recommend this item to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S.

500TC Cotton Cover. Hypo-allergenic, Allergy Free. Dry clean only
Baffle Box design to avoid any shifting in your comforter and Side-Gusset for the Maximum warmth
